document_data.name: Ulvaryl
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ulvaryl''' was a [[vampire]] member of [[Bodhi]]'s coven in [[Athkatla]], active ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].

{{quote|''Already am I dead, thief. Join me in darkness...''|Ulvaryl}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, assassins of the [[Shadow Thieves]] guild attacked the [[archmage]] [[Jon Irenicus]]'s [[Jon Irenicus's Dungeon|dungeon]] underneath Athkatla. The archmage's vampire allies helped to release the assault. Ulvaryl was among the members of the coven that fought against the Shadow Thieves. She came face to face with [[Abdel Adrian]] as he was fleeing from the mage's dungeon. Ulvaryl survived the encounter but taking on her [[bat]] or ''[[gaseous form]]''.
